channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Confluence Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Confluence Server

item.title: CVE-2017-9505|2024-10-16T13:50:42.415Z -- atlassian -- confluence%20server
item.description: Atlassian Confluence starting with 4.3.0 before 6.2.1 did not check if a user had permission to view a page when creating a workbox notification about new comments. An attacker who can login to Confluence could receive workbox notifications, which contain the content of comments, for comments added to a page after they started watching it even if they do not have permission to view the page itself.
